source.name: DYCD after-school programs: Neighborhood Development Area (NDA) Family Support
source.description: A database of facilities in New York City, by agency and site, that offer NDA (Neighborhood Development Area) after-school “Family Support Programs,” including immigrant services, legal assistance, domestic violence, health, housing and literacy programs for adults, seniors, young adults and children of all ages
